thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Mahindra and Mahindra Financial Services Dec Qtr Consol Profit Rises

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Mahindra and Mahindra Financial Services Dec Qtr Consol Profit Rises

organizations.name: mahindra financial services dec qtr consol profit rises
reuters) - mahindra and mahindra financial services ltd

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Mahindra And Mahindra Financial Services Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL PROFIT 3.71 BILLION RUPEES * DEC QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 21.82 BILLION RUPEES
* CONSOL PROFIT IN DEC QUARTER LAST YEAR WAS 160.1 MILLION RUPEES; CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS WAS 17.35 BILLION RUPEES
* SAYS TOTAL ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT OF 517.82 BILLION RUPEES AS ON DEC 31 Source text - bit.ly/2F6mnww Further company coverage:
